item.title: Regular Expressions and Grouping Sets
item.description: There’s a very rich set of PostgreSQL functions to process text, you can find them all at the String Functions and Operators documentation chapter, with functions such as overlay, substring, position or trim. Or aggregates such as string_agg. And then regular expression functions, including the very powerful regexp_split_to_table.
